table.name: projects
table.description: This is the head file for projects.

column.name: id
column.description: The unique identifier for this project.

column.name: name
column.description: A short project name.

column.name: description
column.description: A long description of the project.

table.name: networks
table.description: This table is the head entry for for every network ( master or derived ) on this system.

column.name: id
column.description: The numeric identifier of this network.

column.name: is_master
column.description: This parameter is used only in the context of large system where maps are imported from Navteq or OSM.

column.name: name
column.description: A short descriptive name for this network

column.name: source
column.description: Network, from which current network was derived.

column.name: description
column.description: This is a larger description of this network.

column.name: in_use
column.description: If false, the network cannot be used - same as depricated.

column.name: locked
column.description: If true, the network is read-only.

table.name: nodes
table.description: There are nodes. Nodes represent the beginning or ending of a link.

column.name: id
column.description: The unique ID of this node within a given network.

column.name: network_id
column.description: The ID number of the network this node belongs in.

column.name: geom
column.description: Geo location: SRID 4326.

column.name: in_sync
column.description: This flag indicates whether the node type and position are in sync with the other nodes in the family.

table.name: node_names
table.description: A Name assigned to a given node.

column.name: node_id
column.description: The node that this name is referning to.

column.name: network_id
column.description: The uique ID for the associated network.

column.name: name
column.description: The name assigned to this node.

column.name: id
column.description: The unique ID for this node type.

column.name: description
column.description: A description of the node type.

column.name: in_use
column.description: This indicates wether or not this node type should be shown when a user selects a node type. Setting this parameter to false prevents a user from selecting it but allows historical reporting.

table.name: node_type_det
table.description: The node type for a node in a network as defined by link types.

column.name: node_id
column.description: The node id for this detail.

column.name: network_id
column.description: The network ID for this detail.

column.name: node_type_id
column.description: The node's type is derived from node_types.

column.name: geom
column.description: Geometry: SRID 4326

column.name: length
column.description: Length in meters.

column.name: detail_level
column.description: From 1 (important) to 5 (less so) used for subselection.

column.name: in_sync
column.description: This flag indicates whether the link configuration is synchronized with the rest of the links in the family.

table.name: link_names
table.description: A Name assigned to a given link.

column.name: link_id
column.description: The link that this name is referning to.

column.name: network_id
column.description: The uique ID for the associated network.

column.name: name
column.description: The name assigned to this link.

column.name: id
column.description: The unique ID for this link type.

column.name: description
column.description: A description of the link type.

column.name: in_use
column.description: This indicates wether or not this link type should be shown when a user selects a link type. Setting this parameter to false prevents a user from selecting it but allows historical reporting.

table.name: link_type_det
table.description: The link type for a link in a network as defined by link types.

column.name: link_id
column.description: The link id for this detail.

column.name: network_id
column.description: The network ID for this detail.

column.name: link_type_id
column.description: The links type derived from link_types.

column.name: link_id
column.description: The link id for this defintion

column.name: network_id
column.description: The network ID for this lanes definition

column.name: lanes
column.description: Number of lanes.

column.name: link_id
column.description: The link id for this defintion

column.name: network_id
column.description: The network ID for this lanes offset definition

column.name: display_lane_offset
column.description: This parameter indicates how link should be displayed at the map.

column.name: speed_limit
column.description: In meters per second.

table.name: link_turn_rest
table.description: Turn restrictions from unique to a network.

table.name: net_conn_sets
table.description: This is a set of network connections. Each set is owned by a project. Each set may be used by one or more scenarios.

column.name: id
column.description: The uique ID for this connection set

column.name: project_id
column.description: The project this set is owned by.

column.name: name
column.description: The short name for this set.

column.name: description
column.description: This is the long description of this set.

table.name: net_conns
table.description: This record connects two networks and provides the orginating and destination link.

column.name: from_net_id
column.description: The origin network ID that this connector refres to.

column.name: from_link_id
column.description: The link within the originating network.

column.name: to_net_id
column.description: The destination network that this connetor points to.

column.name: to_link_id
column.description: The link in the destination network.

column.name: id
column.description: The uique ID for this destination network.

column.name: dest_link_id
column.description: The link to walk to on a foreign network

column.name: project_id
column.description: The project that owns this destination.

table.name: dest_network_links
table.description: A destination link in a network to traverse into.

column.name: link_id
column.description: The link to traverse to on the network id

column.name: dest_network_id
column.description: the network ID that contains the link to land on.

table.name: routes
table.description: A route across one or more networks.

column.name: id
column.description: The uique ID for this route.

column.name: project_id
column.description: The project that owns this route.

column.name: name
column.description: The name of this route.

table.name: route_links
table.description: A set of links to traverse for a given route.

column.name: route_id
column.description: The uique ID for this route.

column.name: link_id
column.description: A link on the route.

column.name: link_order
column.description: The order in which the links in this route are to be traversed.

table.name: veh_type_sets
table.description: A record of a set of vehicle types.

column.name: id
column.description: The unique ID for this set.

column.name: project_id
column.description: The project that owns this set.

column.name: id
column.description: The unique ID for this vehicle type

column.name: size_factor
column.description: This value is 1 for usual vehicles, and typically 3 for trucks.

column.name: is_standard
column.description: Flag indicating whether this is a standard type (if true) or user-defined.

table.name: veh_set_det
table.description: This is a parent / child table to create sets of vihicles in vehicle sets associated with a project.

column.name: veh_type_set_id
column.description: The ID vehicle_type_set.

column.name: veh_type_id
column.description: The vehicle type id from veh_types

table.name: init_dens_sets
table.description: Sets of intial densities for this project.

column.name: id
column.description: The unique ID for this set.

column.name: project_id
column.description: The project that owns this initial density set.

column.name: name
column.description: The short name for this init dens set.

column.name: description
column.description: The long description for this initial density set.

column.name: action_time
column.description: The time in seconds that this initial condition applies to.

table.name: init_dens
table.description: This table contains initial densities for a model.

column.name: init_dens_set_id
column.description: The ID of the init_dens_set

column.name: link_id
column.description: The initial link on which this density applies.

column.name: veh_type_id
column.description: The vehicle type that this denisty represents from the table vehicle_types.

column.name: dest_network_id
column.description: If the destination is not specified, the demand is added to the background flow.

table.name: weave_sets
table.description: A set of weaving factors for this project.

column.name: id
column.description: The unique ID for this set.

column.name: project_id
column.description: The project that owns this weave set.

column.name: name
column.description: The short name for this weave set.

column.name: description
column.description: The long description for this weave set.

table.name: weaving_factors
table.description: This is the child table DS_BNDRY_CAP_SETS and defines an exit boundery flow limit for a given link

column.name: weave_set_id
column.description: The parent of this weave_factor.

column.name: in_link_id
column.description: Inbound link.

column.name: out_link_id
column.description: Outbound link.

column.name: veh_type_id
column.description: vehicle type as defined in veh_types.

column.name: value
column.description: Should be greater than 1 for downstream merge weaving, or less than -1 for upstream diverge weaving. 1 and -1 represent no weaving.

column.name: id
column.description: The unique ID for this set.

column.name: name
column.description: The short name for this split ratio set.

column.name: description
column.description: The long description for this split ratio set.

table.name: split_ratio_profs
table.description: A split ratio for a given node in a given network.

column.name: id
column.description: The uique ID for this split ration profile.

column.name: split_ratio_set_id
column.description: The split ratio set this profile is a member of.

column.name: node_id
column.description: The node that this split ratio is calculated from.

column.name: dest_network_id
column.description: If the destination is not specified, the demand is added to the background flow.

column.name: sample_rate
column.description: Sampling rate in seconds. Default is 300 (5 minutes).

column.name: start_time
column.description: Start time in seconds. Default is 0.

table.name: split_ratios
table.description: A split ratio for a given link pair.

column.name: split_ratio_prof_id
column.description: The split ratio profile set that this record is a member of.

column.name: in_link_id
column.description: The inbound link into the node the ratio is defined on.

column.name: out_link_id
column.description: The exit link that the ratio is built around.

column.name: veh_type_id
column.description: The vehicle type this ratio is based upon

column.name: ratio_order
column.description: Order of the split ratio

column.name: ratio
column.description: Value between 0 and 1.

column.name: id
column.description: The unique ID for this vehicle type

table.name: fund_diag_sets
table.description: A set of fundamental diagrams for this project.

column.name: id
column.description: The unique ID for this set.

column.name: project_id
column.description: The project that owns this FD set.

column.name: fund_diag_type_id
column.description: The type of fundamental diagram.

column.name: name
column.description: The short name for this FD set.

column.name: description
column.description: The long description for this FD set.

column.name: sample_rate
column.description: Sampling rate in seconds. Default is 300 (5 minutes).

column.name: start_time
column.description: Start time in seconds. Default is 0.

table.name: fund_diagrams
table.description: A fundamental Diagram for a link in the network.

column.name: fund_diag_prof_id
column.description: The FD Profile Set this profile is a member of.

column.name: diag_order
column.description: Order of the fundamental diagram

column.name: free_flow_speed
column.description: Free flow speed in m/s.

column.name: critical_speed
column.description: Critical speed in m/s.

column.name: cong_wave_speed
column.description: Congestion wave speed in m/s.

column.name: capacity
column.description: Maximum flow per lane in vehicles per second per lane.

column.name: jam_density
column.description: Maximum density per lane in vehicles per meter per lane. Optional - used for trapezoidal fundamental diagrams.

column.name: capacity_drop
column.description: Capacity drop in vehicles per second per lane. Optional.

column.name: capacity_std
column.description: Expression of uncertainty in capacity in vehicles per second per lane. Optional.

column.name: free_flow_speed_std
column.description: Expression of uncertainty in free flow speed in m/s. Optional.

column.name: cong_wave_speed_std
column.description: Expression of uncertainty in congestion wave speed in m/s. Optional.

table.name: demand_prof_sets
table.description: This is a set of demands for the given project and scenario.

column.name: id
column.description: The unique ID of this SET.

column.name: project_id
column.description: The ID number of the project that owns this set.

column.name: name
column.description: The short name for this set

column.name: description
column.description: A long description of this set.

column.name: dest_network_id
column.description: If the destination is not specified, the demand is added to the background flow.

column.name: sample_rate
column.description: Sampling rate in seconds. Default is 300 (5 minutes).

column.name: start_time
column.description: Start time in seconds. Default is 0.

column.name: knob
column.description: Coefficient by which the demand is multiplied before being fed to the simulation. Default value is 1.

column.name: std_dev_add
column.description: Additive demand uncertainty in vph. Default value is 0.

column.name: std_dev_mult
column.description: Multiplicative demand uncertainty. Default value is 1.

column.name: number
column.description: Order of the demand

column.name: demand
column.description: Demand flow in vph.

column.name: id
column.description: The unique ID for this set.

column.name: project_id
column.description: The project that owns this DSB_CAP set.

column.name: name
column.description: The short name for this DSB_CAP set.

column.name: description
column.description: The long description for this DSB_CAP set.

column.name: sample_rate
column.description: Sampling rate in seconds. Default is 300 (5 minutes).

column.name: start_time
column.description: Start time in seconds. Default is 0.

table.name: ds_bndry_caps
table.description: An exit boundary flow limit for a given link

column.name: ds_bndry_cap_order
column.description: Order of the downstream boundary capacity

column.name: ds_bndry_cap
column.description: Maximum flow that can exit this link in vph.

table.name: sensor_sets
table.description: A set of sensors for this project.

column.name: id
column.description: The unique ID for this set.

column.name: project_id
column.description: The project that owns this sensor set.

column.name: name
column.description: The short name for this sensor set.

column.name: description
column.description: The long description for this sensor set.

table.name: sensor_types
table.description: Each sensor is of a particular type. This table represents the allowable types.

column.name: id
column.description: The unique Id for this sensor type.

column.name: description
column.description: The displayed description of this sensor type, e.g.: loop, Sensys, TMC, etc.

column.name: in_use
column.description: Allow this sensor type to be used.

column.name: id
column.description: The unique ID for this sensor.

column.name: java_class
column.description: Column for user-defined sensors.

column.name: entity_id
column.description: How this sensor is identified in the field. In reality, this can be a group of sensors - VDS.

column.name: measurement_source_id
column.description: Which data feed does this sensor belong to.

column.name: display_geometry
column.description: SRID 4326

column.name: link_id
column.description: If link ID is not present, the sensor is not assigned.

column.name: link_offset
column.description: Offset in meters from the begining of the link.

column.name: lane_num
column.description: Optional parameter indicating at which lane the sensor is located.

column.name: health_status
column.description: Value in the range of [0, 1], indicating how healthy the detector is: 0 = dead/ totally unreliable, 1 = 100% trustworthy.

table.name: signal_sets
table.description: This is a set of signals used by a scenario.

column.name: id
column.description: The unique ID for this signal set.

column.name: project_id
column.description: The project that owns this set.

column.name: name
column.description: The short name for this signal set.

column.name: description
column.description: The long description of this signal set.

table.name: signals
table.description: This record represents a signal on a node. This can be any type of signal, but this is primarily a representation of your typical three light signal.

column.name: id
column.description: The unique ID for this signal.

column.name: set_id
column.description: The signal set that owns this signal.

column.name: node_id
column.description: The node that this signal is associated with.

column.name: std_org
column.description: The Standards oraganization this sginal is based upon.

column.name: std_id
column.description: The standard code of this signal in the context of the standard organization as defined in the column STD_ORG

table.name: signal_phases
table.description: These are signal phase minimums. Processes within simlation can modify a signals properties but cannot modify outside the parameters that a phse record presents.

column.name: signal_id
column.description: The signal this phase is associated with.

column.name: phase_id
column.description: Phase number: 1-16. Currently used are 1-8.

column.name: is_protected
column.description: Is this a protected signal.

column.name: is_permissive
column.description: Is this a permisive signal.

column.name: is_lagged
column.description: Is the signal lagged.

column.name: recall_type
column.description: What recal type is associated with this signal.

column.name: do_recall
column.description: Perform a recall.

column.name: min_green_time
column.description: Minimum green time in seconds.

column.name: yellow_time
column.description: Yellow time in seconds.

column.name: red_clear_time
column.description: Time required to clear the intersection after the signal turned red, in seconds.

column.name: phase_id
column.description: Phase number: 1-16. Currently used are 1-8.

table.name: controller_sets
table.description: A set of controllers for this project.

column.name: id
column.description: The unique ID for this set.

column.name: project_id
column.description: The project that owns this controller set.

column.name: name
column.description: The short name for this controller set.

column.name: description
column.description: The long description for this controller set.

table.name: controller_types
table.description: Each controller is of a particular type. This table represents the allowable types.

column.name: id
column.description: The unique Id for this controller type.

column.name: description
column.description: The displayed description of this controller type, e.g.: ALINEA, HERO, etc.

column.name: in_use
column.description: Allow this controller type to be used.

column.name: java_class
column.description: Column for user-defined controllers.

column.name: dt
column.description: Invocation period in seconds. Default is 30.

column.name: display_geometry
column.description: SRID 4326

column.name: start_time
column.description: Start time in seconds. Default is 0.

column.name: duration
column.description: Active time in seconds. Default is 86400 (24 hours).

table.name: queue_controller_types
table.description: Each queue controller is of a particular type. This table represents the allowable types.

column.name: id
column.description: The unique Id for this queue controller type.

column.name: description
column.description: The displayed description of this queue controller type, e.g.: QueueOverride, PI, etc.

column.name: in_use
column.description: Allow this queue controller type to be used.

column.name: java_class
column.description: Column for user-defined queue controllers.

table.name: event_sets
table.description: A set of events for this project.

column.name: id
column.description: The unique ID for this set.

column.name: project_id
column.description: The project that owns this event set.

column.name: name
column.description: The short name for this event set.

column.name: description
column.description: The long description for this event set.

table.name: event_types
table.description: Each event is of a particular type. This table represents the allowable types.

column.name: id
column.description: The unique Id for this event type.

column.name: description
column.description: The displayed description of this event type, e.g.: accident, rain, etc.

column.name: in_use
column.description: Allow this event type to be used.

column.name: id
column.description: The unique identifer for this event.

column.name: event_set_id
column.description: The event set that owns this event.

column.name: action_time
column.description: The time in seconds that this event will take its action in the simulation.

column.name: event_type_id
column.description: The type of event. Rain, wreck, light change, pretty much anything.

column.name: java_class
column.description: Column for user-defined events.

column.name: name
column.description: The name of the event.

column.name: description
column.description: Long comment for this event.

column.name: disp_geom
column.description: SRID 4326

column.name: enabled
column.description: If the event is not enabled, it does not fire.

column.name: split_ratio
column.description: Value between 0 and 1.

table.name: scenario_element_types
table.description: Type of a scenario element: link|node|signal|sensor|controller|event.

column.name: id
column.description: The unique Id for this scenario element type.

column.name: description
column.description: The displayed description of this event type, e.g.: link, controller, etc.

column.name: in_use
column.description: Allow this scenario element type to be used.

column.name: element_id
column.description: Reference to the scenario element with parameters.

column.name: element_id
column.description: ID of the controller or the event that works with referenced scenario elements.

column.name: name
column.description: Table name

column.name: is_key
column.description: Indicates if this column is a part of the key for finding table elements.

column.name: parent_element_id
column.description: ID of the controller or the event that works with referenced scenario elements.

column.name: parent_element_type_id
column.description: Determines where to look for the referenced scenario element: controller|event.

column.name: type
column.description: feedback or target

column.name: element_id
column.description: Reference to the scenario element.

column.name: element_type_id
column.description: Determines where to look for the referenced scenario element: link|node|signal|sensor|controller|queue controller|event.

table.name: scenarios
table.description: A scenario is a set of links to various tables that each hold data that identifies conditions that set a scenario''s initial conditions.

column.name: id
column.description: The unique ID for this scenario.

column.name: project_id
column.description: The project that owns this scenario. A scenario can only be owned by one project.

column.name: name
column.description: The short name of this scenario.

column.name: description
column.description: Long description of this scenario.

column.name: net_conn_set_id
column.description: The ID of the network connection set for this scenario.

column.name: veh_type_set_id
column.description: The vehicle set for this scenario.

column.name: signal_set_id
column.description: The signal set for this scenario.

column.name: sensor_set_id
column.description: The sensor set for this scenario.

column.name: split_ratio_set_id
column.description: The set of split ratios for this scenario.

column.name: weave_set_id
column.description: The set of weaving factors for this scenario.

column.name: init_dens_set_id
column.description: The initial Density Set for this scenario.

column.name: fund_diag_set_id
column.description: The fundemental diagram profile set for this scenario.

column.name: demand_prof_set_id
column.description: A set of demand Profiles.

column.name: ds_bndry_cap_set_id
column.description: This is the downstream boundary capacity profile set id for this scenario.

column.name: controller_set_id
column.description: This is the controller set for this scenario.

column.name: event_set_id
column.description: The event set for this scenario.

column.name: enkf_np_set_id
column.description: This is the set of ENKF noise parameters for this scenario.

table.name: network_sets
table.description: This is a set of networks used by a scenario.

table.name: dest_network_sets
table.description: This is a set of destination networks used by a scenario.

column.name: dest_network_id
column.description: The uique ID for this destination network set

table.name: route_sets
table.description: This is a set of routes used by a scenario.

table.name: application_types
table.description: Application type: BeATS simulator, freeway estimator.

column.name: id
column.description: The unique Id for this aggregation type.

column.name: description
column.description: The displayed description of this aggregation levels, e.g.: 5-minute, etc.

column.name: in_use
column.description: Allow this event type to be used.

column.name: sim_start_time
column.description: Start time in seconds. Default is 0.

column.name: sim_duration
column.description: Active time in seconds. Default is 86400 (24 hours).

column.name: sim_dt
column.description: Simulation step in seconds. Default is 1.

column.name: output_dt
column.description: Frequency of writing the output in seconds. Default is 60.

column.name: status
column.description: Status of the run execution.

table.name: def_sim_settings
table.description: These are the default settings for a given scenario

column.name: sim_start_time
column.description: Start time in seconds. Default is 0.

column.name: sim_duration
column.description: Active time in seconds. Default is 86400 (24 hours).

column.name: sim_dt
column.description: Simulation step in seconds. Default is 1.

column.name: output_dt
column.description: Frequency of writing the output in seconds. Default is 60.

column.name: estim_start_time
column.description: Start time in seconds. Default is 0.

column.name: estim_duration
column.description: Active time in seconds. Default is 86400 (24 hours).

column.name: estim_dt
column.description: Simulation step in seconds. Default is 1.

column.name: output_dt
column.description: Frequency of writing the output in seconds. Default is 60.

column.name: run_mode
column.description: Online or offline.

column.name: model_type
column.description: LNCTM, VCTM, or combined.

column.name: data_source
column.description: Data source: model, PeMS, probes, etc.

column.name: enkf_mean
column.description: Noise mean in m/s.

column.name: enkf_stdev
column.description: Noise standard deviation in m/s.

column.name: status
column.description: Status of the run execution.

table.name: def_estim_settings
table.description: These are the default settings for a given scenario

column.name: estim_start_time
column.description: Start time in seconds. Default is 0.

column.name: estim_duration
column.description: Active time in seconds. Default is 86400 (24 hours).

column.name: estim_dt
column.description: Simulation step in seconds. Default is 1.

column.name: output_dt
column.description: Frequency of writing the output in seconds. Default is 60.

column.name: run_mode
column.description: Online or offline.

column.name: model_type
column.description: LNCTM, VCTM, or combined.

column.name: data_source
column.description: Data source: model, PeMS, probes, etc.

column.name: enkf_mean
column.description: Noise mean in m/s.

column.name: enkf_stdev
column.description: Noise standard deviation in m/s.

table.name: quantity_types
table.description: Type of data: standard (mean)|std|1Q|3Q|best case|worst case|max|min.

column.name: id
column.description: The unique Id for this quantity type.

column.name: description
column.description: The displayed description of this quantity type, e.g.: best case, etc.

column.name: in_use
column.description: Allow this quantity type to be used.

table.name: aggregation_types
table.description: Aggregation level: raw|1min|5min|15min|1hour|1day|total.

column.name: id
column.description: The unique Id for this aggregation type.

column.name: description
column.description: The displayed description of this aggregation levels, e.g.: 5-minute, etc.

column.name: in_use
column.description: Allow this aggregation level type to be used.

column.name: free_flow_speed
column.description: Free flow speed in m/s.

column.name: critical_speed
column.description: Critical speed in m/s.

column.name: congestion_wave_speed
column.description: Congestion wave speed in m/s.

column.name: capacity
column.description: Maximum flow in vehicles per second.

column.name: jam_density
column.description: Maximum density in vehicles per meter. Optional - used for trapezoidal fundamental diagrams.

column.name: capacity_drop
column.description: Capacity drop in vehicles per second. Optional.

column.name: los
column.description: LOS - Level Of Service as defined in Highway Capacity Manual.

column.name: vc_ratio
column.description: Volume to capacity ratio.

column.name: phase
column.description: Phase number: 1-16. Currently used are 1-8.

column.name: begin_green
column.description: Begin of the green period for the given phase. Optional - makes sense only for raw data.

column.name: duration
column.description: Duration of green for this phase in seconds.

column.name: phase
column.description: Phase number: 1-16. Currently used are 1-8.

column.name: phase_utilization
column.description: Percentage of green used.

column.name: progression_quality
column.description: Percentage of vehicles arriving during green phase.

column.name: delay_per_cycle
column.description: Delay per cycle for given phase.

column.name: queue_size
column.description: Size of the queue waiting for green phase.

column.name: number_of_stops
column.description: Number of cycles needed to pass through intersection.
